object_name.value: Validate user is not the sole QO Approver of the selected document

title.value: Verify if the user is not only the sole QO Approver of the selected document.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
This workflow contains documents where one or more prior approval steps contain only authors. Authors cannot be the sole approvers. Reject the task so that approvers can be updated.

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where not exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and any wf_qo_approvers is not nullstring and any wf_qo_approvers not in (select wf_authors from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id='$value(r_object_id)' and any wf_authors is not nullstring enable(ROW_BASED)))
